name: Tattoo Patchouli Blend Goat's Milk Soap with Frankincense, Vanilla, Sandalwood
description:
"Tattoo" is the perfect name for this intense patchouli blend goat's milk soap by Succulent Soapworks - the intoxicating fragrance stays on your skin just like your ink! An fabulous blend of patchouli with frankincense, sandalwood, vanilla, musk and more is the essence of "Tattoo," a one-of-a-kind goat's milk soap only by Succulent Soapworks. The heady fragrance is blended into a peach and smoke swirled skin-loving soap with naturally occurring alpha hydroxy acids. No detergents, no sulfates (SLS), no alcohol, biodegradable, paraben free, gluten free.

Soap bars are approximately 4 ounces; sizes vary as each bar is cut by hand. Each soap is different!

If irritation should occur, please discontinue use; consult a physician. Our products are for external use only and to be used with total discretion and sole responsibility. Test first for allergies on a small area of skin.

Ingredients: Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Safflower Seed Oil, Glycerin (kosher, of vegetable origin), Goat’s Milk, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide (saponifying agent), Sorbitol (moisturizer), Sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), Soy bean protein (conditioner), Titanium Dioxide (mineral whitener used in opaque soaps), mica and oxide colorants, fragrance oil.

Listing is for one bar of soap. Shipping: $3.50 in the United States; $2.50 each additional bar. Contact Succulent Soapworks for combined shipping for big savings! Shipping overages of $1.00 or more will be refunded.

Succulent Soapworks accepts Paypal; you may pay with a major credit card through Paypal without having an account. Just follow their simple instructions!

name: Norwegian Wood Spruce & Sugar Christmas Holiday Goat's Milk Soap
description:
Woodsy, sweet and almost a little fruity; the essence of winter holidays is captured in "Norwegian Wood" goat's milk soap by Succulent Soapworks! This refreshing bar combines just the right amount of Norway spruce (not overpowering, like some evergreen-fragranced soaps), sugar and a hint of spiced fruit into one beautiful sage green Christmas / holiday soap! As you use this soap, the first note will be the sweetness, followed by the clean crisp evergreen scent. It will soothe and nurture dry winter skin with goat's milk, containing naturally occuring alpha hydroxy acids. No detergents, no sulfates (SLS), no alcohol, biodegradable, paraben free, gluten free and phthalate free.

Soap bars are approximately 4 ounces; sizes vary as each bar is cut by hand. Each soap is different!

If irritation should occur, please discontinue use; consult a physician. Our products are for external use only and to be used with total discretion and sole responsibility. Test first for allergies on a small area of skin.

Ingredients: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin (kosher, of vegetable origin), Goat’s Milk, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide (saponifying agent), Sorbitol (moisturizer), Sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), Soy bean protein (conditioner), Titanium Dioxide (mineral whitener used in opaque soaps), mica, oxide colorant, proprietary fragrance blend.

name: Celebration Breast Cancer Awareness Pink Goat's Milk Soap
description:
"Cancer is a word, not a sentence." - John Diamond. Succulent Soapworks honors breast cancer warriors and their loved ones with our "Celebration" goat's milk soap! This pretty pink soap celebrates life and love with an absolutely delicious fragrance of tropical fruit, a bit of cake and a dollop of buttercream frosting. You'll want to eat this soap - but please don't! Proceeds from the sale of Celebration soap will be donated to Tough Enough To Wear Pink, for their efforts to fund breast cancer charities.

Our goat’s milk soap contains naturally occuring alpha hydroxy acids for soft, silky skin. No detergents, no sulfates (SLS), no alcohol, biodegradable, paraben free, gluten free.

Soap bars are approximately 4 ounces; sizes vary as each bar is cut by hand. Each soap is different!

If irritation should occur, please discontinue use; consult a physician. Our products are for external use only and to be used with total discretion and sole responsibility. Test first for allergies on a small area of skin.

name: Sweet Tooth Coconut and Vanilla Goat's Milk Soap
description:
The best, most coconutty fragrance ever in a soap - "Sweet Tooth" by Succulent Soapworks!  You will have to stop yourself from eating this soap - it's that yummy! This rich and luscious soap smells just like a freshly cracked coconut; absolutely no weird chemical smell as with some coconut fragrances. Also, the vanilla very lightly lingers on the skin, not the coconut, so you don't smell like a black-socks-and-sandals Palm Beach tourist! "Sweet Tooth" is a skin-loving goat’s milk soap with naturally occurring alpha hydroxy acids. No detergents, no sulfates (SLS), no alcohol, biodegradable, paraben free, gluten free.

*** This soap contains essential oil; if you are pregnant, please consult your physician before using.

Soap bars are approximately 4 ounces; sizes vary as each bar is cut by hand. Each soap is different!

If irritation should occur, please discontinue use; consult a physician. Our products are for external use only and to be used with total discretion and sole responsibility. Test first for allergies on a small area of skin.

name: Hot Toddy Spiced Apple Cider & Brandy Goat's Milk Soap
description:
Get warm and cozy with the newest fall / autumn offering by Succulent Soapworks: Hot Toddy, a luscious spiced apple cider and brandy soap cocktail! Hot Toddy is Succulent Soapworks' own enticing blend of caramelized apple cider drenched in rich brandy. Think Calvados, or Applejack. The apple fragrance is crisp and clean, not TOO spicy as some fall apple fragrances can be. The delicious concoction is blended into a skin-loving goat’s milk soap with naturally occuring alpha hydroxy acids. No detergents, no sulfates (SLS), no alcohol, biodegradable, paraben free, gluten free. This succulent soap is THE essence of fall.

Soap bars are approximately 4 ounces; sizes vary as each bar is cut by hand. Each soap is different!

If irritation should occur, please discontinue use; consult a physician. Our products are for external use only and to be used with total discretion and sole responsibility. Test first for allergies on a small area of skin.

name: Caravan Spice Goat's Milk Soap
description:
Send your camel to bed because it's midnight at the oasis! You'll love the newest fall / autumn soap by Succulent Soapworks: Caravan Spice! 

Caravan Spice is an exotic blend of fall spices like cloves, ginger and cinnamon combined with myrrh, vanilla, and a touch of orange. The enticing concoction is blended into a skin-loving goat’s milk soap with naturally occuring alpha hydroxy acids. No detergents, no sulfates (SLS), no alcohol, biodegradable, paraben free, gluten free. This succulent soap is the perfect fragrance for a cozy fall!

Soap bars are approximately 4 ounces; sizes vary as each bar is cut by hand. Each soap is different!

Due to the high vanilla content, this soap may darken or become more tan or brownish. This is completely natural; unless an additional chemical color stabilizer is used, all soaps made with vanilla will eventually darken and it has absolutely no effect on the quality of the soap.

If irritation should occur, please discontinue use; consult a physician. Our products are for external use only and to be used with total discretion and sole responsibility. Test first for allergies on a small area of skin.

Ingredients: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin (kosher, of vegetable origin), Goat’s Milk, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide (saponifying agent), Sorbitol (moisturizer), Sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), Soy bean protein (conditioner), Titanium Dioxide (mineral whitener used in opaque soaps), iron oxide colorant, fragrance oil.

name: Empress Goat's Milk Soap - Amber, Russian Tea, Incense, Vanilla, Leather
description:
This might be the most feminine, beautiful soap ever made - "Empress" by Succulent Soapworks. Imagine rich amber while sipping Russian tea sweetened by a drop of vanilla, while smoky incense wafts on air, all while reclining on a leather divan. Yes, it's THAT good. If that isn't enough, the intoxicating fragrance is blended into skin-loving goat’s milk soap with naturally occuring alpha hydroxy acids. No detergents, no sulfates (SLS), no alcohol, biodegradable, paraben free, gluten free.

This fragrance will linger on the skin after bathing; but it's not overpowering so it will not interfere with perfumes and colognes.

Succulent Soapworks' own decadent blend of rich Damask rose, intoxicating Cabernet wine, and sweet wild wineberries in a skin-loving goat’s milk soap with naturally occuring alpha hydroxy acids. No detergents, no sulfates (SLS),  no alcohol, biodegradable, paraben free, gluten free. This succulent soap is intensely fragrant and boldly floral (and is embellished with a little silk rose)!
